title: James Bond
body: Ibuprofen: 2 200mg pills orally twice a day.
minBody: Ibuprofen: 2 200mg pills orally twice a day.

title: John Smith
body: 1000 milligrams (mg) of amoxicillin and 30 mg of lansoprazole, each given three times a day (every 8 hours) for 14 days.
minBody: 1000 milligrams (mg) of amoxicillin and 30 mg of lansoprazole, each given three times a day (every 8 hours) for 14 days.

title: Kevin Jones
body: Amoxicillin: 1 500mg pills orally in the morning with a meal for 10 days.
minBody: Amoxicillin: 1 500mg pills orally in the morning with a meal for 10 days.
